FEEDBACK after 30 Days. I just finished 30 Days of Yoga (in about 50 days..) and I want to leave a Feedback for whomever stumbles upon this. I am a 24 year old male chemistry student, just for the record. I recommend to every human being to try out this set of yoga-videos, more so than any other yoga course, be it a group class or other youtube videos. Here's why:

Adriene's videos are an approach to modern yoga not as a universal, dogmatic and strictly defined practice, but rather a personal and individual one ("there are no rules"). Everyone is different and yoga is about creating awareness for what is going on in your body and mind, you have to develop (and you will) a feeling for what your body wants, a feeling for sore muscles and which positions relieve that soreness, a feeling for a stressed mind and how you can relieve that stress, calm down and recover your energy. Not only will you find the fitness and sport part of yoga but also the meditative aspects and the importance of mindfulness, in a simple, down-to-earth manner. This is a practical, straightforward and completely free set of videos that introduces you to what modern yoga can be all about, in my opinion.

Thank you, Adriene!
